query:
SELECT
                p.deployment_id,
                p.id as probe_id,
                p.active,
                p.interval_seconds,
                pr.executed_at as last_check,
                pr.success as last_success
            FROM probes p
            LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
                SELECT executed_at, success
                FROM probe_results
                WHERE probe_id = p.id
                ORDER BY executed_at DESC
                LIMIT 1
            ) pr ON true
            WHERE p.deployment_id = ANY($1)
